articles.title: 3 in-demand side hustles to start in 2023―one pays up to $100 per hour - CNBC
articles.description: Americans continue to earn money outside of full-time work through side hustles. For those interested in diving in, consider pet care and tutoring in 2023.
articles.content: Side hustles continue to be a popular way for Americans to make some extra cash. Nearly half, 40% of Americans currently have a side hustle, according to a May 2022 Zapier survey of 2,032 U.S. adults… [+4129 chars]

articles.author: Grace Dean
articles.title: A journalist who interviewed Sam Bankman-Fried about FTX's collapse said it 'felt like a therapy session' for the crypto mogul - Yahoo Canada Finance
articles.description: "He just had a lot to get off his chest and clearly wanted to get through this," Good Morning America's George Stephanopoulos said.
articles.content:
An Good Morning America journalist said that interviewing former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried "felt like a therapy session" for the crypto mogul.
"He really wanted to talk," George Stephanopoulos said.… [+1141 chars]
